data.title: Brookfield Properties
data.meta_description: Brookfield Properties | 296,972 followers on LinkedIn. Our success starts with our people. People like you. | Brookfield Properties develops and operates real estate investments on behalf of Brookfield Asset Management ‚Äî one of the largest alternative asset managers in the world. From office to retail, logistics to multifamily, and hospitality to development, we work across sectors to bring high-quality, sustainable real estate to life around the globe every day.
data.text:
Art has the incredible power to connect communities, and it‚Äôs this transformative potential that fuels our collaborations with creatives around the world. We‚Äôre excited to share some of the impactful works that have enriched our global portfolio. Here‚Äôs a look at these thought-provoking and inspiring artworks and exhibitions! üé® First Nations Art Guide: Across our Australian office spaces, we feature collaborations with First Nations artists, transforming these areas into platforms for storytelling, education, and connection to Country. üé® Summer in Tangier by Myriam au Citron: Experience the vibrant summer vibes of Tangier, Morocco, through Myriam au Citron‚Äôs whimsical illustrations, now on display in the Summer Garden at ICD Brookfield Place. üé®Tasmeem: Memory Box: Showcasing 12 artworks selected through an open call developed by multi-disciplinary Designer Wafa AlFalahi, this exhibition explores the folkloric tales, dances, music, proverbs, and games integral to our upbringing, revealing the shared experiences that thread through our lives. Find it on display on level 1 at ICD Brookfield Place. üé® Double Rift #4 by Richard Serra: A part of our permanent collection at 660 Fifth Avenue, this monumental work by one of the most influential artists of the twentieth century, Richard Serra, exemplifies the powerful intersection of drawing and sculpture. These art activations not only enhance the aesthetic of our spaces but also foster a deeper connection to the communities and cultures we serve. Discover more about our art collections: https://lnkd.in/gz6iQ5Dh #ArtsBrookfield #community #permanentartcollection #CulturalConnections #CreativeSpaces #ArtExhibition #PublicArt #GlobalArt #ArtAndEvents #Australia #Dubai #Office #BrookfieldPlacePerth #ICDBrookfieldPlace

Today on #WomensEqualityDay, we are inspired by the incredible women breaking barriers and leading the way in their industries. We are especially proud to highlight three of our own leading women who exemplify these values. Dana R. Wright, Director of Corporate Security, is a constant source of inspiration on our U.S. Retail team. Championing the Brookfield Women‚Äôs Network, Dana continues to be an engaging and thoughtful speaker in her industry. Congratulations on your feature in Loss Prevention Magazine. Katie Williams, Senior Vice President of Marketing is honored by GlobeSt.com as one of the ‚Äò2024 Women of Influence.‚Äô Katie‚Äôs fresh and inspired approach to marketing and brand creation has left a lasting impact, making her well deserving of this recognition! Erin McCarthy, Vice President and Head of Retail Development and New Business Development is recognized as one of Women We Admire‚Äôs 2024 ‚ÄòTop Women Leaders of Baltimore.‚Äô Erin‚Äôs strategic vision and dedication to innovation are reshaping the future of retail, and we are thrilled to see her celebrated. We are committed to supporting and celebrating the achievements of all our team members as we work together to build a more equitable future. #BrookfieldProperties #BrookfieldPropertiesRetail #BrookfieldPropertiesDevelopment #WomeninLeadership #WomensEqualityDay #RealEstate #Office #Retail #Security #Marketing #Development

Our commitment to sustainability is driving innovation and excellence across our global portfolio. We‚Äôre excited to share recent milestones that reflect our dedication to creating healthier, more sustainable environments. üåè In India, Ecoworld 4D becomes Karnataka's first high performance building to achieve LEED v4 BD+C: CS Platinum certification during construction. This certification underscores our commitment to creating sustainable, healthy, and efficient workplaces. üåè In Canada, we earned the WELL Health-Safety rating once again, showcasing our adherence to top-tier operational and safety standards in the office environment. üåè One The Esplanade in Perth, Australia achieved the WELL Core certification at the Gold level and the WELL Health-Safety ating, establishing it as one of the city‚Äôs most sustainable new commercial developments. These achievements underscore our dedication to advancing sustainability and promoting tenant well-being across our projects around the world. Congratulations to all the teams, partners, and individuals involved for making these milestones possible!

Leases are built on relationships, and our recent successes at IAH West Distribution Center in Houston and Maybrook Logistics Center in the Hudson Valley demonstrate this: A national building materials manufacturer and distributor, already occupying part of our IAH West facility, decided to expand further at the Houston property. Additionally, they have signed a lease at our Maybrook facility in Montgomery. These deals highlight how essential relationships are in the real estate industry. By understanding our tenants' needs, delivering exceptional facilities, and fostering strong connections, we create an environment where businesses can grow. The ability to build and maintain these relationships across multiple markets is a testament to our team's dedication and expertise. A big thanks to our team for their hard work in securing these deals and for their continued support of our tenants. For leasing opportunities in Houston, contact Ryan Soule, and in the Northeast, Kyle McGrady. Kudos also to our brokerage teams for their work in facilitating the deals: Maybrook Logistics Center: Tom Consiglio, SIOR IAH West: Nathan Wynne, Jason Dillee, Jon Farris, Susan Haysom #BrookfieldProperties #CRE #Logisticsdevelopment #IndustrialCRE

On behalf of our entire DTLA team, we were honored to host the inaugural DTLA Office Games in the heart of Bunker Hill. This event represents the vibrant spirit and collaborative energy that defines our community. "The DTLA Alliance extends its deep gratitude to Brookfield Properties for their steadfast leadership and support in our mission to create a more vibrant, engaging, and welcoming Downtown experience, especially for employees. Brookfield Properties continues to be a global leader and advocate for placemaking in the workplace, and their innovative approach has been a driving force behind our recent initiatives, including the Life is Better in Person Valentine‚Äôs Day flower giveaway, free midday concerts at Colburn School, meditation events at Figueroa at Wilshire, and the pop-up pickleball court at Bank of America Plaza featured in the inaugural DTLA Office Games.‚Äù ‚Äì Gabriel Yeager, Director of Placemaking & Events, DTLA Alliance Great job, Gabriel and the DTLA Alliance team! We are grateful for the opportunity to partner with you and look forward to many more successful events together.

Our efforts to building a better world for people, society, and the planet drives our social initiatives across the globe. On this #WorldHumanitarianDay, we‚Äôre proud to highlight the incredible dedication of our teams who embody our mission to make a positive impact. From April to June, our Brazil team led a winter campaign, collecting over a thousand items like blankets, coats, boots, scarves, and socks. With over 90% of employees participating, all items were donated to the Salvation Army, ensuring they reached those in need. Brazil also celebrated the 12 days of Arrai√° Beneficente across four projects in our portfolio. Partnering with Casa do Zezinho, an institution supported by Philanthropic Matching. Our development and multifamily teams embraced the spirit of #BrookfieldCares during our inaugural #MayOfCaring. Partnering with over 50 charitable organizations, they made a significant impact in 21 markets by serving thousands of meals, assembling care kits, walking and running miles, collecting essential goods, and donating substantial funds to various causes. These initiatives highlight the collective efforts of our global team to make a difference. Thank you to everyone who contributed and participated in these meaningful events. Brookfield Residential #brookfieldcares #BrookfieldpropertiesinBrazil #multifamily #development #WorldHumanitarianDay #Brazil

We are deeply committed to inspiring growth and fostering the development of the next generation of professionals. Our Summer 2024 interns have truly exemplified this dedication, infusing passion, innovation, and enthusiasm into our teams across retail, arts & events, logistics, and multifamily. Their experiences and insights have been invaluable, and we are excited to share their advice for future interns. Swipe through to read their words of wisdom and join us in celebrating their journey. If you‚Äôre ready to take the next step in your career and explore opportunities with us, visit our careers page to learn more.: https://lnkd.in/gU3xqaWJ #InternLife #CareerAdvice #Summer2024 #BrookfieldProperties #SummerInterns #InternshipExperience #FutureLeaders #RealEstate #Retail #Office #Arts #Logistics #Multifamily #RealEstate

We believe in prioritizing self-care and promoting healthy routines. That's why our properties are equipped with fantastic wellness amenities such as indoor swimming pools, weekly yoga classes, meditation rooms, and more. Recently, tenants at Aldgate Tower in London enjoyed a refreshing morning pilates class, courtesy of Activated by #BrookfieldProperties. This community engagement program brings office tenants together through live experiences, workshops, well-being activities, arts, and events. üßò‚ôÇÔ∏è‚ú® Last month, the Faria Lima Square and Faria Lima Financial Center in Brazil offered free morning yoga classes for our tenants, offering a moment of meditation to help build health and well-being. Join us in celebrating #NationalWellnessMonth and making time for self-care! How are you prioritizing your well-being this month? #ActivatedBrookfieldProperties #AxiisApp #CorporateWorkshop #CorporateProgramming #AldgateTower #London #Office

Collaboration is at the core of our success. By fostering strong team bonds, encouraging creative problem-solving, and promoting continuous learning, we empower our employees to work together effectively and become the best versions of themselves every day. Our Brookfield Properties team in India attended their 2024 annual offsite, where they engaged in insightful knowledge-sharing sessions, fun team-building exercises, and games that fueled synergy and team spirit among all, they seized each moment and truly embodied the ‚ÄòOne Team‚Äô spirit. Congratulations on the successful offsite!üí™‚ú®
